# Interactive graph
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
<script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>

<h1>Interactive Plots</h1>

<div class="centerer">
    <h2>Dependency Graph</h2>
    Type the name of an R package to view it's dependency graph. If your
    package is not in our 20102 packages, closest one will be picked.
    (yay algos!)
</div>
<div class="input-group">
    <input type="text" id="textbox" placeholder="ggplot2" />
    <button id="submitBtn">Draw</button>
</div>
<div id="plot1"></div>
<hr />

<div class="centerer">
    <h2>Package Enhancers</h2>
</div>
<div id="plot2"></div>
<hr />

<div class="centerer">
    <h2>Package Usage</h2>
</div>
<div id="plot3"></div>
